comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when viewing group details. It appears on an info panel and serves as a placeholder text until group information is loaded or available.

usage.context: {isGuests ? t("InfoPanel:GuestsEmptyScreenText") : isGroups ? t("InfoPanel:GroupsEmptyScreenText") : t("InfoPanel:MembersEmptyScreenText")} ); };

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation 'Skonfiguruj szczegóły grupy tutaj' translates to 'Configure group details here', which deviates from the intended meaning of 'See group details here'. It implies an action (configuration) rather than a direction to view information.

The translation 'Detaliile grupei aici' is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'See group details here'. A more natural Romanian phrasing would convey the action of viewing details, not just stating their location.

The translation 'Здесь будут представлены подробности о группах' is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'See group details here'. It's more formal and verbose. The original implies a call to action to view details, while the translation simply states that details *will* be presented.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Более подходящий вариант: 'Смотрите подробности о группах' or 'Посмотрите информацию о группах'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මෙතැන සමූහයේ විස්තර බලන්න' is a literal translation but lacks the natural flow of the English phrase 'See group details here'. A more natural translation would be something like 'සමූහයේ තොරතුරු මෙහි බලන්න' or 'මෙම සමූහයට අයත් තොරතුරු බලන්න'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'සමූහයේ තොරතුරු මෙහි බලන්න' or 'මෙම සමූහයට අයත් තොරතුරු බලන්න'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tu nájdete informácie o skupine' (Here you will find information about the group) is a functional translation, but not the best equivalent to 'See group details here'. It lacks the immediacy and invitation of the original. A more accurate and natural translation would convey the idea of viewing or accessing the details directly.

The translation 'Vidi detalje grupe ovde' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'See group details here'. 'Vidi' is the imperfect tense of 'videti' (to see), implying a continuous action in the past.  'See' in this context means 'view' or 'check'.
